questions.question: how to make friends
questions.answer:
If you are looking to make friends, you can start by engaging in social activities and joining clubs or groups that align with your interests. Building connections with others through shared activities can help foster new friendships. For more detailed information on this topic, you can refer to this link: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20195#coursecontentcollapse3

What specific activities or hobbies are you interested in that could help you meet like-minded people?
